participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Eli has a strong desire to understand his new abilities and how to control them.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i was born with my heart outside my body. i am a boy.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and supportive, Maya loves encouraging others to lead healthy lifestyles and participate in physical activities.
participant_2.background: i am a woman. i'm married. i'm a vegetarian. i enjoy sports such as running.
